title: Enhance eagle logo entry animation with head-activated neon glow

requirements.text: Implement head-first power-on animation for the eagle logo where neon energy originates from the eagle head and instantly spreads across the full logo during entry

quotes: The eagle should appear as if powering on from the head first.
Neon energy begins at the eagle head and instantly spreads across the full logo.

acceptanceCriteria: Eagle logo animates with parent container transforms: opacity 0→1, scale 0.85→1, translateY 25px→0, duration 1-1.2s ease-out
Neon glow is visible from the first frame of animation
Glow originates from eagle head area and flows to wings and body

requirements.text: Apply strongest electric blue neon glow on the eagle head and eyes that is visible from the first frame and creates the visual impression of an energy source

quotes: Apply strongest electric blue neon glow on the eagle head and eyes.
Glow must already be visible from the first frame.
Head area should feel like the energy source.

acceptanceCriteria: Head and eyes have brightest neon glow intensity
Glow exists before animation begins (not animated from zero opacity)
Visual hierarchy establishes head as the power source

requirements.text: Create smooth energy spread effect that flows from head to wings to full body over 0.4-0.6 seconds with subtle light propagation, avoiding flashing or harsh transitions

quotes: During entry animation, glow flows smoothly from head → wings → full body.

acceptanceCriteria: Glow propagation animation duration is 0.4-0.6 seconds
Smooth transition from head→wings→body without sudden changes
No flickering or harsh intensity jumps

requirements.text: Implement three-layer neon glow system consisting of inner illumination inside eagle head, medium glow around outline, and soft outer ambient aura behind head

quotes: Soft outer ambient aura behind head.

acceptanceCriteria: Three distinct glow layers are visible
Inner layer illuminates head interior
Medium layer outlines the eagle shape
Outer layer creates ambient aura effect

requirements.text: Add cinematic light bloom burst at the eagle head when animation starts, with optional subtle shimmer sweep across wings once

quotes: Add short light bloom burst at the head when animation starts.
Optional subtle shimmer sweep once across wings.

acceptanceCriteria: Light bloom effect appears at head at animation start
Bloom is short and non-intrusive
Optional shimmer sweep executes once across wings

requirements.text: After entry animation completes, stabilize glow into continuous soft breathing pulse with the head remaining slightly brighter than the rest of the eagle

quotes: Glow stabilizes into continuous soft breathing pulse.
Head remains slightly brighter than rest of eagle.

acceptanceCriteria: Continuous breathing pulse animation after entry completes
Head maintains higher brightness than wings and body
Pulse is subtle and does not distract

requirements.text: Use GPU-accelerated transform animations only, do not animate glow opacity from zero, and ensure glow exists before animation begins for optimal performance

quotes: Do not animate glow opacity from zero.
Glow must exist before animation begins.

acceptanceCriteria: All animations use CSS transform properties
Glow is pre-rendered before animation starts
No opacity animations starting from zero for glow effects

constraints: Must maintain existing EagleLogo.tsx component structure
Animation must feel like an AI emblem activating from the brain/head with premium futuristic automation branding
Must use GPU-accelerated properties only for performance
Must not modify read-only UI component sources in frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changes to backend or data models
Modifications to other sections or components
Alternative logo designs or replacement assets
